participant_2.background:
I once worked as a circus freak, showing off my third thumb to the public.
I'm constantly daydreaming about my future acting career and the perfect romantic partner, which leads me to procrastinate on my current projects.
I overcame my fear of heights to ski down a mountain.
i love to cook.

content.text: Hi, I'm a teacher. What do you do for work?
I'm a bit of a jack of all trades. I've worked as a circus freak, a chef, and a professional actor.
A circus freak? That's really interesting! What was that like?
It was a lot of fun! I got to travel all over the world and meet all sorts of interesting people.
That sounds awesome! I've always wanted to travel the world.
It's definitely something everyone should experience at least once in their life.
I agree. I'm hoping to take a trip to Europe next year.
Europe is amazing! I've been there a few times and I love it.
Which country is your favorite?
I'm not sure I could pick just one. I love them all for different reasons.
I can see why. They're all so beautiful and unique.
Exactly! I'm sure you'll have a great time when you go.
Thanks, I'm looking forward to it!
So, what do you like to do for fun?
I love to read, cook, and ski.
I love to cook too! What's your favorite dish to make?
I love to make pasta dishes. They're so easy and delicious.
I love pasta too! I'm a sucker for a good pasta carbonara.
Me too! It's one of my favorite dishes.
Have you ever tried making it at home?
I have, but it's never quite as good as the restaurant version.
I know what you mean. It's hard to get the sauce just right.
Yeah, it can be tricky.
Well, I'm sure you'll get it eventually. You seem like a good cook.
Thanks, I appreciate that.
You're welcome
